title: Get a beginner friendly intro to MS Office for only $40 through Jan 7
content:
Macworld

Microsoft Office is the de facto king of all productivity suites. And if you want to compete for a job in 2024, then it’s practically an assurance that you’ll need to know at least one of its components. Need to get trained fast? Then the Complete 2021 Microsoft Office Mastery Bundle is a near-perfect resource — and as it’s on sale this week, it’s affordable too.

This is an ideal package for anyone new to MS Office or for those who want to upgrade their existing skills. Students get an introduction to popular apps like Word, Excel, and PowerPoint, plus other tools in Teams, Access, and Outlook. There are courses geared for beginners, and others that provide advanced training so you can go to work and hit the ground running. 

The courses in the Complete 2021 Microsoft Office Mastery Bundle are current for the latest versions of each app. They’re delivered via the web so you can set your own schedule, you’ll enjoy lifetime access, and they’re facilitated by Stream Skill which is a highly rated global provider for tech related training.

The bottom line is, if you want to learn MS Office as quickly as possible and you excel with self directed learning, then the Complete 2021 Microsoft Office Mastery Bundle is worth checking out. And since you can get it for a fraction of the regular price — just $39.97 (reg. $333) until 11:59pm on January 7 — it’s easily accessible no matter what your budget looks like.
